data.name: Ocean Punk
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST & FOLLOW FOR UPDATES!


Join our discord


About the Game

You receive a lead and hear that the mighty Wanderer fleet is about to return. You need to organize a team to search for more information and make contact with them first. The forces of the earth are beginning to stir, and the adventure is bound to be dangerous, but you have no choice. Because you are the chosen one, you must play your part!

Sail a boat



Human science and technology seriously backward, stubborn little people in the remaining small piece of land to build a humble shack, in the rough sea driving boats to start fishing life.

Recreation



The crew can sit on fishing MATS at leisure, drink a pot of tea and fish all day...

Grow crops



At sea day and night, enough bricks must be built to grow nutritious crops and sustain the crew's daily food supply. Potatoes, carrots, peppers... All kinds of crops take root and sprout on the boat, it is a call from the deep memory, driving you to become richer and richer.

Combat system



You will constantly encounter races, friendly and vicious, and you will want to make sure your crew is not destroyed, so take up arms and fight. Weapons and tools are durable. They wear out over time and decay even when left in place, so be sure to return them to the tool rack after use.

Power system



When you build a complete system of power systems, the overall fleet level can be rapidly improved, complex power systems will constantly test your theoretical knowledge, use them to achieve endless possibilities.

Unlock technology



Now that civilization has gone backwards, you must gather inspiration to unlock various technologies, and when crafts are restored the fleet will become stronger and more stable. Each discipline descends into a variety of advanced sub-disciplines, which can bring extraordinary improvements to your fleet.
... There's more to explore
This game has a complex story and a huge system, you may encounter various unexpected bugs before the official release, but please don't be discouraged, we will listen to your feedback and actively improve, BELIEVE that in the near future we will welcome a new world -- it is "Ocean Stream Punk"!

data.short_description: "Ocean Current Punk" is a Marine survival sim that expands the living space by building complex and massive infrastructure systems and fortifications. On your quest to find the truth, you will meet different groups, encounter unexpected events, and strive to become the ruler of the sea.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7/8/10 x86
  • Processor: i5-8265U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
